verse: An oracle about the Wilderness by the Sea.
O my people, you who have been threshed like grain on my threshing floor, everything I have heard from the Lord of Armies, the God of Israel, I have proclaimed to you.
This is what the Lord said to me: “Within a year, as a worker bound by contract would count it, all the glory of Kedar will come to an end,
and the archers who survive, the strong warriors of Kedar, will be few.” The Lord, the God of Israel, has spoken.
